trans-unit.source: ({C} represents colorless mana.) At the beginning of combat on your turn, reveal the top card of your library. trans-unit.resname: POGW·140s | Oath of Nissa | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Oath of Nissa
trans-unit.target: Oath of Nissa

trans-unit.resname: POGW·140s | Oath of Nissa | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When Oath of Nissa enters the battlefield, look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal a creature, land, or planeswalker card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. You may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast planeswalker spells.
trans-unit.target: When Oath of Nissa enters the battlefield, look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal a creature, land, or planeswalker card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. You may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast planeswalker spells.
